Description.Name: Ambush: Rayson Returns
Description.Details: You're having a quiet morning going over various reports when once again you hear the klaxons going off throughout the Argo. You rush to the bridge to see several fast-moving ships buzz past the bridge viewports. Darius looks at you, "Commader, they are hailing us. It's the same bandits we encountered awhile back." "Open comms, Darius." you respond. The shimmering cloaked figure once again addresses you through the holocom, "Ah, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. Welcome back again to my territory. It is so very kind of you to come out this way again. We do appreciate repeat customers, although I do need to inform you, the price for safe passage has doubled." You stand your ground this time, "What makes you think we will just give you our hard earned C-Bills this time?" The shimmering figure chuckles, "Well, you paid before, so my money is on you paying again, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. Just transfer the funds and you can go about your merry way. Don't make me touch up the paint of that ancient shipwreck you're flying around in."

Description.Name: Lose C-Bills & Morale
Description.Details:
As much as it pains you, you approve the payment, "Very well, we will pay your fee." The look of disappointment on Sumire's face echoes that of the rest of the bridge crew.

The shimmering figures claps their hands, "Excellent!  You are wise beyond your years, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}.  Feel free to pop by anytime."

As the pirate ships disappear into the starry distance, you turn to Darius, "Still no updates as to who they are?"

Darius looks up from his panel and shrugs, "Same as before Commander, Jamie Rayson and Mr Bubbles were a formidable team, and current rumors suggest that he will not stop until she is found."

Description.Name: Stall until the Leopard is ready.
The pirates flee
Description.Details: You stare at the pirate on the viewscreen, his visage obfuscated by an obvious cloaking filter, feeling like your stuck in an endless cycle of doing this over and over, before answering, "This ends now... Sumire, LAUNCH!" The figure smiles, "Let's dance, Commander!" The Leopard disengages gracefully from the Argo, unleashing a salvo of LRMs that streak through the void toward the marauding pirate ships. Agile as shadows, the bandit vessels elegantly sidestep the incoming missiles, retaliating with a fusillade aimed at both the Leopard and the Argo. A cosmic ballet unfolds, the interplay of lasers and missiles illuminating the darkness of space. A precise volley from the Leopard finds its mark, mercilessly crippling one of the bandit ships. The wounded vessel limps, its companions rallying around it in a defensive formation. In a strategic retreat, they veer away from the Argo, the enigmatic leader transmitting a final defiant message, "You won this round, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. Be seeing you soon." As the pirate ships disappear into the starry distance, you turn to Darius, "Still no updates as to who they are?" Darius looks up from his panel and shrugs, "Same as before Commander, Jamie Rayson and Mr Bubbles were a formidable team, and current rumors suggest that he will not stop until she is found."

Description.Name: The pirates flee but a MechWarrior is injured
Description.Details: You stare at the pirate on the viewscreen, his visage obfuscated by an obvious cloaking filter, feeling like your stuck in an endless cycle of doing this over and over, before answering, "This ends now... Sumire, LAUNCH!" The figure smiles, "Let's dance, Commander!" The Leopard gracefully disengages from the Argo, unleashing a barrage of SRMs that streak through the cosmic expanse toward the marauding pirate ships. The agile bandit vessels elegantly dodge the incoming missiles while responding with a relentless onslaught, targeting both the Leopard and the Argo. The relentless clash unfolds – lasers and SRMs painting a vivid spectacle against the backdrop of space. Amidst the chaos, a well-aimed volley from the Leopard finds its mark, brutally incapacitating one of the bandit ships. However, the Argo doesn't emerge unscathed. The remaining assailants disengage. As they retreat, the mysterious leader transmits his parting message, "You've wounded us, as we have wounded you, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. Be seeing you soon..." Darius calls out, "Commander, we have sustained minor damage and reports of injured personel throughout the ship, including [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], who was caught in one of the blasts. {SCN_MW.Subj_C} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:have been|Default:has been} taken to MedBay." You acknowledge Darius' report as the pirate ships disappear into the starry distance, "Any more updates as to who they are?" Darius looks up from his panel and shrugs, "Same as before Commander, Jamie Rayson and Mr Bubbles were a formidable team, and current rumors suggest that he will not stop until she is found."

Description.Name: The pirates flee but Argo Damaged
Description.Details: You stare at the pirate on the viewscreen, his visage obfuscated by an obvious cloaking filter, feeling like your stuck in an endless cycle of doing this over and over, before answering, "This ends now... Sumire, LAUNCH!" The figure smiles, "Let's dance, Commander!" Darius calls out, "Commander, we have sustained external damage to the Argo."
